name: RheumNowBlogs
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: RheumNow Blog is an audio version of blogs published on RheumNow.com. This collection offers insight, perspectives, and instruction on the practice of Rheumatology and Medicine. The executive editor of RheumNow is Dr. Jack Cush of Dallas, Texas.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
